title: Bloomberg Markets: Snap Is Most-Shorted Tech IPO of 2017
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Snap Is Most-Shorted Tech IPO of 2017
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Barinka IPO Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Snap Inc. becoming the most-shorted tech initial public offering of the year, with a growing number of traders betting the stock will fall.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
